      • getGlobalDeployment

        @Nullable
public GridDeployment getGlobalDeployment(DeploymentMode depMode,
                                                    String rsrcName,
                                                    String clsName,
                                                    String userVer,
                                                    UUID sndNodeId,
                                                    IgniteUuid clsLdrId,
                                                    Map<UUID,IgniteUuid> participants,
                                                    @Nullable
                                                    IgnitePredicate<ClusterNode> nodeFilter)
        Parameters:
        depMode - Deployment mode.
        rsrcName - Resource name (could be task name).
        clsName - Class name.
        userVer - User version.
        sndNodeId - Sender node ID.
        clsLdrId - Class loader ID.
        participants - Node class loader participant map.
        nodeFilter - Node filter for class loader.
        Returns:
        Deployment class if found.
